pkgmetadata.longdescription: A Convenient API for Accessing United States Census Bureau's Quarterly Workforce Indicator // The purpose of this package is to access the United States Census Bureau's Quarterly Workforce Indicator data. Additionally, the data will be retrieved in a tidy format for further manipulation with full variable descriptions added if desired. Information about the United States Census Bureau's Quarterly Workforce Indicator is available at https://www.census.gov/data/developers/data- sets/qwi.html.
